statements: SELECT * FROM money_laundering_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM money_laundering_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM money_laundering_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM money_laujsondering_transactions
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM money_laundering_transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM money_laundering_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM money_laundering_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM money_laundering_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM money_laundering_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM money_laundering_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, sender_account FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT receiver_account, amount FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions WHERE amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent Activity'
SELECT sender_account, receiver_account, amount FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_account, receiver_account, amount FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions WHERE sender_account LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason = 'Fraud' AND amount > 5000 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE receiver_account = 'XYZ123' AND amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_account FROM potential_money_laundering_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY sender_account ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM potential_money_laundering_activities;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, account_id FROM potential_money_laundering_activities WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, account_holder_name, amount FROM potential_money_laundering_activities ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_type = 'Transfer' AND amount < 1000;
SELECT report_id, report_date, description FROM money_laundering_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM potential_money_laundering_activities
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM potential_money_laundering_activities WHERE amount > 10000
SELECT account_holder_name, amount FROM potential_money_laundering_activities ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_type = 'Suspicious'
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, r.report_date FROM potential_money_laundering_activities t JOIN money_laundering_reports r ON t.account_id = r.suspect_account_id
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT account_number, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_contact, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description, alert_date, transaction_id, account_id FROM alerts;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, address FROM users;
SELECT name, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, address FROM suspicious_users WHERE report_type = 'fraud';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, s.flagged FROM transactions t JOIN suspicious_transactions s ON t.transaction_id = s.transaction_id;
